title: Missing Challenger Ahri and Nidalee from their respective tabs?
body: I own both skins but I'm not able to view them on my Summoner Profile. Will I be able to select them in champion select?

replies.body: Limited skins are sometimes not listed in a champion profile, even if you own the skin. I haven't check if the new client has things synced up properly though.
If you have purchased them, yes, you will be able to use them.
